name: The Collapse (llemaster)
description:
The game is a about characters that fall into a cave due there being unsafe ground above a dungeon. You use each character with unique abilities to escape the Dungeon. Make sure to read the signs to make sure you understand some of the controls and features. 

Note:

If you are connected to the internet, in game information about the amount of time it takes and how many completed are sent to us, to learn how to improve the game.
